networkSetting.title: Network Settings
networkSetting.subTitle: Configure network settings for the application

captureHttps.title: Capture HTTPS Requests
captureHttps.description: Capturing HTTPS requests requires a certificate. Please ensure it's installed

filter.title: Capture Filter
filter.description: Capture filters are used to set rules for capturing requests. You can use Glob patterns to match request URLs

certificate.title: Certificate Management
certificate.subtitle: Manage SSL certificates required for HTTPS capturing

installed.title: Certificate Installed Successfully
installed.description: Your system trusts this certificate and can now capture HTTPS requests.

notInstalled.title: Certificate Installation Required
notInstalled.description: To capture HTTPS requests, you need to install and trust this certificate in your system or browser.

step3.title: Import Root Certificate
step3.description: Select "Place all certificates in the following store" → Click "Browse" → Select "Trusted Root Certification Authorities" → Click "Next"

step4.title: Complete Installation
step4.description: Click "Finish", then click "Yes" in the security warning dialog

step1.title: Open Keychain Access
step1.description: Search for and open "Keychain Access" in Launchpad

step2.title: Import Certificate
step2.description: Select "File" → "Import Items", choose the downloaded certificate

step3.title: Trust Certificate
step3.description: Double-click the imported certificate → Expand "Trust" → Set "When using this certificate" to "Always Trust"

step4.title: Confirm Changes
step4.description: Enter your administrator password to confirm changes

step1.title: Download Certificate
step1.description: Open the certificate download link on your mobile device

step2.title: iOS Devices
step2.description: Go to "Settings" → "General" → "Profile" → Select downloaded certificate → Tap "Install", then enable it in "Settings" → "General" → "About" → "Certificate Trust Settings"

step3.title: Android Devices
step3.description: Go to "Settings" → "Security" → "More Security Settings" → "Encryption & Credentials" → "Install Certificate" → "CA Certificate", select the downloaded certificate file

general.title: General Settings
general.subTitle: Configure basic behavior and appearance of the application

maxLogSize.title: Maximum Log Size
maxLogSize.description: Set the maximum number of logs. When exceeded, the oldest logs will be removed

validation.required: Please enter the maximum log size
validation.range: Maximum log size must be between 60 and 6000
